name: Eddyspeak
short_description: Eddyspeak is an orrigional translation content management system. It allows you to translate GNU GetText PO files using a browser. This allows a comunity to work on the same file at the same time and speeds up development. Uses: PHP, MySQL and Python.

topic.fullpath: Topic :: Text Editors :: Integrated Development Environments (IDE)
